alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 17 at 2:49PM AKDT until October 19 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...East to southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible, shifting to the southwest. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat and City and Borough of Sitka. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Two frontal bands will bring potential for high winds. First Tuesday afternoon/evening and again late Tuesday night into Wednesday. A third potential for high wind will come with a wind shift to the SW during the day Wednesday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Yakutat
